bibl.title: Literacy in Ancient Everyday Life
bibl.seg: Anne Kolb (ed.), Literacy in Ancient Everyday Life.
Berlin - Boston, W. de Gruyter, 2018, x-426 pp., figg. ISBN 978-3-11-059188-0. €79,95.

Papers delivered at the international conference held from the 10th to the 12th of November 2016, Universität Zürich. - Preface (A.K.). - 19 contributions. - I. A Global Perspective. - II. Roman Empire: Social Groups; - Religious Practice; - Administration; - Education. - Index.
C.R. par Günther Poethke, ArchPF 65 (2019) pp. 238-242. - Minna Skafte Jensen, BMCRev < http://bmcr.brynmawr.edu/2019/2019-04-45.html >.
